root.name: Ride to Hell: Retribution
root.description: System RequirementsMinimumOS: Windows XP 32-bit (or above)Processor: AMD Athlon 64 X2 4800+ (2 * 2500 MHz) or Intel Core 2 Duo E4600 (2 * 2400 MHz)Memory: 2 GB RAMGraphics: GeForce 8800 GTS (320 MB) or Radeon HD 3850 (512 MB)DirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX 9.0C compatible sound cardHard Drive: 12 GB HD spaceRecommendedOS: Windows 7 64-bit or aboveProcessor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8300 (2 * 2830 MHz) or similar AMD Athlon 64 X2 5000+ (2 * 2610 MHz)Memory: 4 GB RAMGraphics: Nvidia GeForce GTS 250 (512 MB) or Radeon HD 5850 (1024 MB)DirectX®: 9.0cSound: DirectX 9.0C compatible sound cardHard Drive: 12 GB HD space
